name: Historically Accurate: Treasure Hunting
description:
Explore the depths of the ocean in your Brand New Bathysphere! 

Collect hidden treasure while trying to survive the mysteries of the depths.

A completely accurate and historically correct rendition of the first ever deep sea voyages - we promise! (Pinky Swear!!!).

CONTROLS:

W/S - Forward/Reverse

A/D - Turn Left/Right

SPACE BAR - Move Upward

Collect 8 Treasure Chests to Win the Game!
